forum.section.highlights.desc.message: A quick recap of featured topics, releases, and collaboration cases.

forum.page.description.message: TianGong Forum: page for the Alliance's flagship international conference

forum.currentEdition.theme.message: Global Interconnection, Interoperability, and Mutual Trust for LCA and Carbon Footprint Systems

forum.modules.generalAssembly.note.message: Review annual work and set plans.

forum.modules.specialEvents.note.message: Open/Closed-door roundtables, workshops, and special events.

forum.section.mainActivities.desc.message: Agenda, activities, and sub-forum information will be updated continuously.

forum.venue.address.message: No.18 Huanling Road, Nanjing, Jiangsu, China

forum.section.people.desc.message: Sorted by surname; updated as participation is confirmed.

forum.agenda.mainForum.desc.message: High-level keynotes and major outcome announcements.

forum.agenda.subForums.desc.message: Deep dives into industry topics and data system co-building; updates released separately.

forum.agenda.subForums.petroleum.lead.message: Product carbon footprints driving green, low-carbon development in the petrochemical sector.

forum.agenda.subForums.battery.lead.message: Practice and outlook for product carbon footprints across the battery supply chain.

forum.agenda.subForums.electronics.lead.message: Deep decarbonization across electronics and appliance supply chains.

forum.agenda.subForums.audit.lead.message: Bringing together global LCA and carbon footprint data practices to discuss key topics such as data quality.

forum.agenda.developer.desc.message: A developer-focused track on toolchains, data ecosystems, and practice.

forum.agenda.developer.lead.message: Agenda in progress; topics and cases are welcome.

forum.agenda.special.desc.message: Joint activities across institutions and global collaboration sessions; updated in real time.

forum.agenda.special.assembly.lead.message: Review annual work and release yearly plans and milestone outcomes.

forum.agenda.special.unep.lead.message: UNEP Global LCA Platform working group meeting.

forum.agenda.special.climate.message: International Cooperation on Climate Change and Carbon Neutrality

forum.agenda.special.climate.lead.message: Program and agenda to be confirmed.

forum.section.coCreation.desc.message: Build an interconnected LCA and carbon footprint ecosystem together.

forum.coop.hosting.desc.message: Co-create topics; speakers and formats updated as collaboration progresses.

forum.coop.specialEvents.desc.message: Closed-door roundtables, standards and guideline workshops, and tailored exchanges.

forum.coop.sponsorship.desc.message: Tiered brand exposure, speaking slots, and media visibility.

forum.coop.media.desc.message: Co-build the outreach matrix and share channels and resources.

forum.section.sponsors.desc.message: Contact the secretariat for partnership and sponsorship opportunities.

forum.highlights.2025.title.message: Initiated the Carbon Footprint Industry Technology Innovation Alliance

forum.highlights.2025.theme.message: Cross-sector collaboration to build a product carbon footprint management system

forum.highlights.2023.title.message: Released the open and transparent TianGong Database

forum.highlights.2023.theme.message: Launched a joint research initiative on open sharing and collaborative governance of LCA data.

cooperation.page.description.message: Project release page for industry collaboration and open funding

cooperation.hero.lead.message: Work openly and collaboratively to build high-quality outcomes.

cooperation.section.tracks.lead.message: Focus on research, open source, events, and international cooperation to promote exchange and co-building.

cooperation.tracks.research.desc.message: Joint research on product carbon footprint standards, methods, databases, tools, and pilot validation.

cooperation.tracks.opensource.desc.message: Build open-source code, data, models, and governance mechanisms.

cooperation.tracks.events.desc.message: Organize workshops, training, releases, competitions, and outreach.

cooperation.tracks.international.desc.message: International research, pilots, standards, and platform development.

cooperation.section.projects.lead.message: Projects are open to the alliance and the public. We welcome your cooperation intent.

cooperation.section.projects.footnote.message: Projects are released and reviewed openly; scope and deliverables follow the task brief.

cooperation.projects.tiangong3.focus.message: Participate as a sponsor in organizing the alliance's flagship international forum.

cooperation.projects.tiangong3.funding.message: Sponsorship tiers: Diamond 500k / Platinum 300k / Gold 100k RMB.

cooperation.projects.tiangong3.benefit.message: Brand exposure, industry influence, and access to key speakers.

cooperation.projects.opensource.focus.message: Open-source tool development and ecosystem building for the TianGong system.

cooperation.projects.opensource.benefit.message: Open-source acknowledgements, technical influence, and expanded collaboration network.

cooperation.process.submit.desc.message: Share your cooperation intent and project concept to align goals and resources.

cooperation.process.review.desc.message: Evaluation and discussions to confirm the collaboration model and openness requirements.

cooperation.process.sign.desc.message: Sign task briefs or agreements and start execution and delivery.

cooperation.process.manage.desc.message: Disclose milestones and progress, with mid-term reviews when needed.

cooperation.process.deliver.desc.message: Produce high-impact outcomes, complete acceptance, and publish globally.

cooperation.section.compliance.open.desc.message: Open calls, merit-based selection, and outcome sharing for traceable collaboration.

cooperation.section.compliance.legal.des.message: Funding and IP follow project agreements with clear publication and rights arrangements.

cooperation.section.compliance.results.d.message: Encourage open-source licenses and public release to enhance research significance and social value.

cooperation.section.cta.desc.message: Send your intent or proposal, and we'll follow up after evaluation.
